description: Join us at upcoming community events, workshops, and gatherings hosted by Horizon Community Foundation.

blocks.title: Community Events
blocks.subtitle: Join us for workshops, celebrations, and opportunities to connect

blocks.heading: Upcoming Events
blocks.content: We host regular events throughout the year to bring our community together. From educational workshops to celebration galas, there's always something happening at Horizon.

cards.title: Youth Leadership Graduation
cards.description:

Celebrate the achievements of our latest Youth Leadership cohort. Family and community members welcome.

cards.title: Digital Skills Workshop
cards.description:

cards.description:

Free health screenings, fitness demos, and wellness resources for the whole family.

cards.title: Annual Spring Gala

blocks.heading: Regular Programs
blocks.content:
In addition to special events, we offer ongoing programs throughout the week:

Monday & Wednesday: Adult Education Classes (6-8 PM)

Tuesday & Thursday: Youth Leadership Meetings (4-6 PM)

Saturday: Community Wellness Activities (9 AM - 12 PM)

First Friday: Monthly Community Mixer (5-7 PM)

blocks.heading: Host an Event With Us
blocks.text: Looking to host a community event? Our community center is available for nonprofit and community gatherings.
